title: Stable Diffusion LoRA Training Task
name: diffusion-train-task
setup: uv pip install transformerlab diffusers peft safetensors torch torchvision accelerate 'datasets==4.4.2' 'pyarrow==22.0.0' huggingface_hub 'transformers==4.57.3'
description: A LoRA trainer for Stable Diffusion models (SD 1.x, SDXL, SD3, Flux). Trains on images with captions and generates sample images before and after training.
